summary: A criminal comes to town in order to kill Billy Chong over a past dispute. But instead of getting his own hands dirty, he hires a Taoist wizard to animate some zombies to do the job for him... See full summary Â»
cast: Billy Chong|Lau Chan|Kang-Yeh Cheng|Kei-Ying Cheng|Yan Hsiao|Wei Hu|Yeong-Mun Kwon|Kuang Yung Lin|Sha-Li Pai|Jen-Chi Shen|Yu Wang
director: Director: Shan Hua (as Hwa I Hung)
title: Kung Fu Zombie
